Avalon Finder SNAPSHOT

Avalon Finder API
org.apache.avalon.finder Definition of the primary finder interface that provides support for dynamic pull-bassed service activation.

 

Avalon Finder Implementation
org.apache.avalon.finder.impl Default implementation of the finder contract.

 

ECM Simulator
org.apache.avalon.finder.ecm An experimentation implementation of a component that leverages dynamic service activation based on the legacy ECM product semantics.
org.apache.avalon.finder.ecm.info The ECM meta-info model.
